title: Tailoring the Wadsley–Roth crystallographic shear structures for high-power lithium-ion batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02293A, Paper

Panpan Jing, Mengting Liu, Hsin-Pei Ho, Yifan Ma, Weibo Hua, Haohui Li, Nan Guo, Yong Ding, Weilin Zhang, Hailong Chen, Bote Zhao, Jenghan Wang, Meilin Liu
A tailored Wadsley–Roth crystallographic shear structure containing inspiring domains with tetrahedron, tetrahedron-free and large-size blocks in the lattice of novel titanium niobium tungsten oxide for high-power lithium-ion batteries.
